title: Cleanup, refactor and fixes
description: The electron app developed in `src/` needs to be cleaned up so that it's nice and modular. References `README.md`, `docs/FILE_ORGANISATION.md`. Every single file change must be reflected in `docs/FILE_ORGANISATION.md`.

features.title: The app needs to be responsive to resizing
features.description: Currently most of the views don't resize properly when the window is resized. Especially with the sidebar to the sidebar on the left side, it doesn't stay there and if something big gets opened, like the Document viewer - then the screen becomes too big. We need to have a common strategy for this. The sidebar should also be collapsible.

features.title: App wide navigator
features.description: Right now in `src/renderer/screens/TasksView` you can open modals but they open in a weird way (with the TasksView underneath them). Modals need to be standardized and for this, there needs to be a Navigator somewhere which allows to be used to work out if a given modal or screen should be showing.

features.title: Organise files
features.description: A lot of the logical code is in the renderer but there should be a clear logic/ui split. Propose changes that will be documented in `docs/FILE_ORGANISATION.md` and carry out the clean up.

features.title: Create standards
features.description: There's a big discrepancy in how certain views are created or styled - there needs to be a standard for this. Create a standard and document it in `docs/STANDARDS.md`.
